name: SHOWTIME: STATIC
description:
SHOWTIME:  STATIC! The long-awaited sequel to the popular game SHOWTIME! NOTE FOR BROWSER PLAYERS: click the game once after hitting play show to load the game. It may take a while depending on your device, and the credits may or may not play as well. Story Summary:

You play as Static a man who doesn't know where he came from and how long he has been in this self-colored world. You both must find out the secret of why he is there.

Official SHOWTIME Discord server!

https://discord.gg/cXkkZjk8Db
